pageContext.description:
The garden has been transformed into an area of tranquility, a seating area to enjoy light refreshment and even for open air recitals where the public can relax in the beautiful setting which is at the centre of the cathedral complex.

Original Watercour image size 13.75"x9.5"

Mounted to fit frame size 20"x16"

Price £245

A signed, embossed, limited edition print, mounted to fit frame size 14"x 11"

Price £40.

pageContext.metaDescription: Watercolour painting of Chapter House Garden, Hereford Cathedral. By Herefordshire artist David J. Fry.
